#summary Testresults for Testsuite testing

= Introduction =

To get a first overview of the completness of Office Reader, it was tested using this ODF "testsuite": http://develop.opendocumentfellowship.com/testsuite/ 

Please note, that office reader is not a desktop application, but an application for mobile devices. So in a lot of cases where a feature is not supported and the test fails, it would not even make sense to implement this on a mobile device.
